data.question: What is the name of the new magnesium metalâ€“organic framework reported?
What unique interaction does CPM-107 have?
At what temperature does CPM-107 open and turn into a rigid porous form with CO2?
Is the transformation of CPM-107 to a porous form reversible via desorption?
data.answer: No, it is irreversible via desorption.

data.question: Can CPM-107, once opened by CO2, be accessed by other gas types?
data.answer: Yes, it remains in the stable porous state accessible to additional gas types.

data.question: What is the effect of CO2 on CPM-107 described as?
What is the structural transformation of CPM-107 from closed to open phase called?
How can the closed phase of CPM-107 be regenerated?
data.answer: By repeating the activation procedure, soaking in CH2Cl2 and then desolvating under vacuum.

data.question: Does CPM-107 have solvent binding sites?
data.answer: No, CPM-107 has no solvent binding sites.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of CPM-107op?
Is the open form of CPM-107 the same as the as-synthesized framework?
data.answer: No, the open form does not correspond to the as-synthesized framework.

data.question: What is the isosteric heat of CO2 adsorption near zero coverage for CPM-107op?
What makes CPM-107op among the best materials for C2H2/CO2 separation?
data.answer: Its high C2H2 uptake capacity and high C2H2/CO2 selectivity.

data.question: Can CPM-107cl be transformed back to CPM-107as by soaking in DMA?
data.answer: No, PXRD did not show the occurrence of CPM-107as.

data.question: Do CPM-107NH2 and CPM-107OH exhibit the same adsorption behavior as CPM-107?
data.answer: No, they have the adsorption behavior of rigid MOFs.

data.question: What is the selectivity of C2H2/CO2 for CPM-107op at 298 K and 1 atm?
Is the transformation from CPM-107cl to CPM-107op reversible?
data.answer: No, the opened phase could not transform back to the closed phase upon desorption.

data.question: What is the role of CO2 in the synthesis path to porous CPM-107?
data.answer: CO2 at 195 K opens CPM-107 and turns it into a rigid porous form.

data.question: What is the significance of the lock-and-key effect in CPM-107?
data.answer: It means the pore can be accessed with CH4, N2, and H2 after being opened by CO2.

data.question: Does heating and vacuum revert CPM-107op back to CPM-107cl?
data.answer: No, they were unable to use heat and vacuum to return CPM-107op back to CPM-107cl.
